abstract: Recently, Nest has been delving deeper into integrating its products with other smart devices.
snippet: Recently, Nest has been delving deeper into integrating its products with other smart devices.
lead_paragraph: Imagine an unoccupied house with a bunch of machines sitting around talking to one another. Saturday morning cartoons? The opening of a dystopic thriller? No, it’s the idea behind a recent acquisition by Nest, the Google-owned maker of Internet-connected appliances like a thermostat and a fire alarm.

headline.main: Nest Buys Revolv, Maker of Smart Appliance Manager
